name: Mature Comedy Visual Novel
description:
GOING WHERE NO GAME EVER FELT LIKE GOING BEFORE

Experience a WORLD* of crude drawings, stock photo backgrounds, primitive VN functionality and an AMAZING* story.

-Meet cast of horrible characters.

-Talk to a cast of horrible characters.

-Choose your own ADVENTURE*.

-Unlock TEN different endings.

-There is one part of the game where you can choose to attempt drowning an annoying anime cosplayer.

-CUTTING EDGE functionality such as a save feature, chapter select and even VOLUME CONTROL!!!!!!

-I think you can also select an ending to re-watch it if you've gotten it already oh man you know what I'm not sure if we did this one or not I'll have to che

*bad

Inspired by esteemed parodic filth often found twenty years ago on websites like Newgrounds, Mature Comedy Visual Novel On Steam Game puts a focus on crass, idiotic humor and interactions between characters who suck. Adventure through a world of uncomfortable ugliness, uncovering a story that you would be better off not knowing!
